name: Nun n' Gun
description:
Description:
  • A nun with a gun must survive an onslaught of apparitions
  • NOTE: this was a quick project made to test some ideas out. Some aspects are not final and/or may be unstable given this is a prototype. 
  • The Web version of this game is probably buggy, but is available to use if you want to quickly try this out. The window size is pretty large so the UI can be properly displayed, but you may have to zoom out on your browser.
Features:
  • a nun
    • with a gun
  • classical music but 8 bit 
    • (shoutout to Sterio18 on freesound for creating that)
  • Also, the gun also can be used as a melee weapon, so you can actually swat enemies away from you if they get too close
Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Button
  • Melee attack: Right Mouse Button
  • Dash: Spacebar
